SystemColumn.Formula: COALESCE([Meeting Title], [Type of Meeting]) & " on " & [Meeting Date]

Column.Name: Meeting Invitees - Users
Column.Formula: EACH [Invitee Name]

Column.Name: Notify Email Addresses
Attended
Column.Formula: IF( [All Attended] = TRUE, TRUE, [Attended] )

Column.Name: Unique Reference
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Unique Reference], NEWUUID())

Column.Name: Action RecordIDs
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Action", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Unique Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Unique Reference]), HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )

Column.Name: Minutes Sent
Column.Formula: NOT(ISBLANK([Notified Email Addresses]))

Column.Name: Invited Count
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH([Meeting Invitees - Users])

Column.Name: Minutes Sent String
Column.Formula: IF( [Minutes Sent] = TRUE, "Yes", "No" )

Column.Name: Previous Meeting
Column.Formula:
LET $nextMeeting := DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Meeting", "[Meeting Title] IS NOT EMPTY AND [Root Meeting RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Root Meeting RecordID]) & " AND [RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Meeting Date] < " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Meeting Date]), HASH("sort", "[Meeting Date] DESC") );
RETURN IF( [Root Meeting RecordID] <> NULL(), $nextMeeting )

Column.Name: Reply to Address
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "Select a user to recieve replies" )

Column.Name: Project Name
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Project Name", "Project", HASH("RecordID", [Project RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Project RecordID
Risk RecordIDs
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Risk", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Unique Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Unique Reference]), HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )

Column.Name: Link RecordID
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL(), "Select a record to link" )
Column.Formula: IF( [Link EFormType] = NULL(), NULL(), [Link RecordID] )

Column.Name: Linkable Forms
Parent RecordID
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LAST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID))

Column.Name: Parent Description
Column.Formula: COALESCE( IFERROR(DB_LOOKUP( "Description", [Parent EFormType], "[RecordID] = " & [Parent RecordID] ), NULL()), [Parent EFormType], NULL() )

Column.Name: Parent EFormType
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID))

Column.Name: Invitee Email Address
Column.Formula:
IF( AND([Invitee] <> NULL(), [Invitee is System User] = TRUE), EBMS_GET_ROLE_EMAIL_ADDRESSES([Invitee]),
AND([Contact Invitee] <> NULL(), [Invitee is Contact] = TRUE), DB_LOOKUP("Email Address", "Contact", HASH("Name", [Contact Invitee])),
[Invitee Email Address] )

Column.Name: Invitee
Column.Formula:
IF( [Invitee is System User] = TRUE, [Invitee],
[Invitee is Contact] = TRUE, [Contact Invitee],
[External Invitee Name] )

Column.Name: Invitee Name
Column.Formula:
IF( [Invitee is System User], EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Invitee]),
[Invitee is Contact], [Contact Invitee],
[External Invitee Name] )

Column.Name: Invitees
Column.Formula: EACH [Invitee]

Column.Name: Frequency
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [Frequency], 1 )

Column.Name: Frequency Measure
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [Frequency Measure], "week" )

Column.Name: Frequency - Next Meeting Date
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "Next meeting date must be specified" )

Column.Name: Frequency Type
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [Frequency Type], "None" )

Column.Name: Frequency - Next Meeting Date Flattened
Column.Formula: TODAY([Frequency - Next Meeting Date])

Column.Name: Flattened Meeting Date
Column.Formula: TODAY([Meeting Date])

Column.Name: Send Agenda on Meeting Date
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Send Agenda on Meeting Date], FALSE)

Column.Name: Notify Internal Email Addresses
Notify External Email Addresses
Column.Formula: ARRAY_JOIN( ARRAY_WHERE( SPLIT([Notify Email Addresses], ", "), $(i, item) ISERROR(FIND("ebms.com.au", $item)) ), ", " )

Column.Name: Number of Attendees
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Attendee], $(i, item) NOT(ISBLANK($item))))

Column.Name: Number of Invitees
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Invitee], $(i, item) NOT(ISBLANK($item))))

Column.Name: Meeting Date End
Column.Formula: GREATEST([Meeting Date End], DATEADD("minute", 1, [Meeting Date]))

Column.Name: Decision RecordIDs
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Decision", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Unique Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Unique Reference]), HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )

Column.Name: Next Meeting RecordID
Column.Formula:
LET $nextMeeting := DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Meeting", "[Root Meeting RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Root Meeting RecordID]) & " AND [RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Meeting Date] > " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Meeting Date]), HASH("sort", "[Meeting Date] ASC") );
RETURN IF( [Root Meeting RecordID] <> NULL(), $nextMeeting )

Column.Name: Agenda Item - Hours
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Agenda Item - Hours], 0)

Column.Name: Agenda Item - Minutes
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Agenda Item - Minutes], 0)

Column.Name: Agenda Total Hours
Column.Formula: FLOOR([Total Agenda Duration in Minutes] / 60)

Column.Name: Agenda Total Minutes
Column.Formula: MOD([Total Agenda Duration in Minutes], 60)

Column.Name: Total Agenda Duration in Minutes
Agenda Item Start Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [LineNumber] = 1, [Meeting Date],
DATEADD("minute", [Cumulative Minutes]#([LineNumber]-1), [Meeting Date]) )

Column.Name: Cumulative Minutes
Column.Formula: SUM( SUM(ARRAY_TAKE(EACH [Agenda Item - Hours], [LineNumber])) * 60, SUM(ARRAY_TAKE(EACH [Agenda Item - Minutes], [LineNumber])) )

Column.Name: Agenda End Time
Column.Formula: DATEADD("minute", [Total Agenda Duration in Minutes], [Meeting Date])

Column.Name: Include in Minutes
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Include in Minutes], TRUE)

Column.Name: Monday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Monday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Monday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Tuesday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Tuesday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Tuesday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Wednesday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Wednesday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Wednesday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Thursday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Thursday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Thursday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Friday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Friday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Friday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Saturday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Saturday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Saturday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Sunday Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Sunday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Sunday Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date]), MINUTE([Meeting Date])) ) )

Column.Name: Monday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Monday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Monday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Tuesday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Tuesday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Tuesday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Wednesday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Wednesday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Wednesday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Thursday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Thursday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Thursday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Friday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Friday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Friday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Saturday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Saturday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Saturday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Sunday End Time
Column.Formula:
IF( [Recurring Meeting - Sunday] <> TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE( [Sunday End Time], DATE(YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), DAY(NOW()), HOUR([Meeting Date End]), MINUTE([Meeting Date End])) ) )

Column.Name: Agenda Item - Duration String
Meeting Link Exists
Column.Formula: NOT(ISBLANK([Calendar Event ID]))

Column.Name: Changed Calendar Details
Preview Calendar Details
Record Select
Column.Formula:
IF( AND([Record Select] < 0, [RecordID] > 0), [RecordID],
COALESCE([Record Select], [RecordID]) )

Column.Name: Previous Meetings and This Meeting
Column.Formula: LET $set := ARRAY_CONCAT([Previous Meetings], [RecordID]); RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL())

Column.Name: Integration Settings
Mail Merge Options - Document Selection
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], ARRAY_FIRST(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options], "Custom Templates")))

Column.Name: Mail Merge Options
Mail Merge Options 2
Mail Merge Options - Document Selection 2
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection 2], ARRAY_FIRST(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options], "Custom Templates")))

Column.Name: Mail Merge Visible
Column.Formula: AND( [Navigation] = "Functions", [Document Generation] = "Meeting Agenda" )

Column.Name: Mail Merge Visible 2
Column.Formula: AND( [Navigation] = "Functions", [Document Generation] = "Meeting Minutes" )

Column.Name: Email Mail Merge Options - Document Selection
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [Email Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], HASH( "FileName", [Mail Merge Purpose], "Type", "Default Template" ) )

Column.Name: Email Mail Merge Options - Document Selection 2
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [Email Mail Merge Options - Document Selection 2], HASH( "FileName", [Mail Merge Purpose 2], "Type", "Default Template" ) )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Column.Name: Invitee Type
Column.Formula:
IF( [Invitee is Contact], "Contact",
[Invitee is Other], "Other",
"System User" )

[DisplayName] IS NOT EMPTY AND [IsSystem] <> TRUE AND [Username] <> 'automatedTester'
[DisplayName] IS NOT EMPTY AND [IsSystem] <> TRUE AND [Username] <> 'automatedTester'

Risk Data

Meeting URL

[Status] = "Exercised"

Label.Text: Specify which users can access this record. Hover over the information icon for more details

Information.Text:
Everyone: Access is defaulted to permissions determined by system configuration
Invitees Only: this record can only be accessed by the user who created this record and the meeting invitees
Note that certain users - for example, administrators - can access this record irrespective of this selection

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
--check if user is in group always granted access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check that the parent is not a contract - if not, these users have access by default WHEN [Parent EFormType] <> 'Contract' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
--check if user is in assignment on record - these users always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Invitees]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Project Team]) THEN TRUE
--Check if access is set to Everyone WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Everyone' THEN ( CASE
--check if parent record is a Contract WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if parent record is a Procurement WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) --check if root parent record is a EVALUATION WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) ELSE FALSE
END )
--return false if no requirements met ELSE FALSE
END

CASE
--check if user is in group always granted access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
--check if user is in assignment on record - these users always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Invitees]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Project Team]) THEN TRUE
--Check if access is set to Everyone WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Everyone' THEN ( CASE
--check if parent record is a Contract WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if parent record is a Procurement WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) --check if root parent record is a EVALUATION WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) ELSE FALSE
END )
--return false if no requirements met ELSE FALSE
END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE
WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Everyone'
THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All'
--check if user is in group always granted access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
--check if user is in assignment on record - these users always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Invitees]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Project Team]) THEN TRUE
--return false if no requirements met ELSE FALSE
END

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH( "Meeting Title", [Meeting Title], "Meeting Objective", [Meeting Objective], "Meeting Date", [Meeting Date], "Meeting Date End", [Meeting Date End], "Location", [Location], "Invitees", EACH [Invitee Name], "Invitees Email Addresses", [Invitee Email Address], "Meeting App", [Online Meeting] )

LET $url := HASH_GET(HASH_GET(JSONDECODE([Calendar Event Response]), "onlineMeeting"), "joinUrl");
RETURN IF( [Online Meeting] = "zoom", [Zoom Meeting URL], ISBLANK($url), [Calendar Event URL], $url )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND([Calendar Event Response Code] <> "200", [Calendar Event Response Code] <> "201")

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger: Get Token (Zoom) (only when Zoom is selected)

HttpRequest.Description: Check Zoom User Exists (only when Zoom is selected)

FieldEntry.Formula: IF([Online Meeting] = "zoom", AND([Zoom Meeting Response Code] = "200", [Calendar Event Response Code] = "200"), [Calendar Event Response Code] = "200" )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set if user exists for online meeting

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: Called By email address doesn't match a user required to create meeting invite, please check email address

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger: Check if required users exist
Trigger: Get Zoom Meeting URL (if zoom is selected)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: IF( [Online Meeting] = "zoom", OR([Zoom Meeting Response Code] = "201", [Zoom Meeting Response Code] = "200"), TRUE )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Calculate end date based on new time

HttpRequest.UrlTemplate: https://api.zoom.us/v2/users/{[Meeting Called By Email]}/meetings/{[Zoom Meeting ID]}

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND([Zoom Meeting Response Code] <> "200", [Zoom Meeting Response Code] <> "201")

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Email Address", ARRAY_INDEX(HASH_GET([Temp], "Email Recipients"), $count), "Action data", ARRAY_INDEX(HASH_GET([Temp], "Action data"), $count) )
